value.excerpt: In this video, I show you how you can configure the data source of a Power BI report within Power BI Report Server. value.title: Download and Deploy a K12 Power BI Solution for schools

This solution includes instructions to create views for use with the Power BI reports. It also includes a Power BI Desktop template for pre-created reports based on your school data.  GitHub Repo
